amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of DOD funding to maintain a permanent U.S. military presence in Haiti beyond December 31, 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 13 and printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175 to prohibit the use of DOD funding to maintain a permanent U.S. military presence in Haiti beyond December 31, 1999.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 198 (Roll no. 183).
